concept.title: The subjectrefs attribute
concept.shortdesc: The subjectrefs attribute specifies one or more keys that are defined by a subject definition in a subject scheme map. Multiple values are separated by white space.

conbody.p: The subjectrefs attribute cascades. When specified on a topic reference, the subjectrefs attribute associates the referenced resource with subjects that are defined in subject scheme maps.
The DITA 2.0 specification does not indicate processing expectations for the subjectrefs attribute. The DITA Technical Committee expects to specify such expectations in the future.
